dependencies.name: py-cffi

dependencies.name: py-py

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: Node Resource Manager
dependent_to.name: nrm

dependent_to.description:
Circus is a program that will let you run and watch multiple processes
and sockets.
dependent_to.name: py-circus

dependent_to.description: A workflow engine for cycling systems.
dependent_to.name: py-cylc-flow

dependent_to.description: Cylc UI Server.
dependent_to.name: py-cylc-uiserver

dependent_to.description: IPython Kernel for Jupyter
dependent_to.name: py-ipykernel

dependent_to.description: IPython's architecture for parallel and distributed computing.
dependent_to.name: py-ipyparallel

dependent_to.description:
Quickly and easily parallelize Python functions using IPython on a
cluster, supporting multiple schedulers. Optimizes IPython defaults to
handle larger clusters and simultaneous processes.
dependent_to.name: py-ipython-cluster-helper

dependent_to.description: Jupyter protocol client APIs
dependent_to.name: py-jupyter-client

dependent_to.description:
The Jupyter Server provides the backend (i.e. the core services, APIs,
and REST endpoints) for Jupyter web applications like Jupyter notebook,
JupyterLab, and Voila.
dependent_to.name: py-jupyter-server

dependent_to.description:
Melissa is a file-avoiding, adaptive, fault-tolerant and elastic
framework, to run large-scale sensitivity analysis or deep-surrogate
training on supercomputers. This package builds the launcher and server
modules.
dependent_to.name: py-melissa-core

dependent_to.description: Jupyter Notebook as a Jupyter Server Extension.
dependent_to.name: py-nbclassic

dependent_to.description: Jupyter Interactive Notebook
dependent_to.name: py-notebook

dependent_to.description: Simple data dependent workflows in Python
dependent_to.name: py-parsl

dependent_to.description:
Petastorm is a library enabling the use of Parquet storage from
Tensorflow, Pytorch, and other Python-based ML training frameworks.
dependent_to.name: py-petastorm

dependent_to.description: LCLS II Developement: PSAna Python.
dependent_to.name: py-psana

dependent_to.description:
The pytecplot library is a high level API that connects your Python
script to the power of the Tecplot 360 visualization engine. It offers
line plotting, 2D and 3D surface plots in a variety of formats, and 3D
volumetric visualization. Familiarity with Tecplot 360 and the Tecplot
360 macro language is helpful, but not required.
dependent_to.name: py-pytecplot

dependent_to.description: Jupyter Qt console
dependent_to.name: py-qtconsole

dependent_to.description:
RADICAL-Utils contains shared code and tools for various RADICAL-
Cybertools packages.
dependent_to.name: py-radical-utils

dependent_to.description:
SCOOP (Scalable COncurrent Operations in Python) is a distributed task
module allowing concurrent parallel programming on various environments,
from heterogeneous grids to supercomputers.
dependent_to.name: py-scoop

dependent_to.description:
Visdom aims to facilitate visualization of (remote) data with an
emphasis on supporting scientific experimentation.
dependent_to.name: py-visdom

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
